list.name: Changes

task.summary: Translated in english other terms and names remained in italian; in GameState added missing methods/getter/setter necessary for the operation of GameController

Removed JFrame and Listener libraries/dependencies; Added constructor and private methods for: 1. Starting the game (startGame), 2. Distribution cards (dealCards...), 3. Round and turn management between player and computer (playRound/playerMove/aiMove), 4. Basic logic of possible catches (findPossibleCaptures), 5. Round end (checkRoundEnd/endRound), 6. Log, print and main test methods for debugging.
P.S. Currently no point calculation, no player choice and no AI logic implemented
Added a generic method for the player and AI move and removed the duplication; optimized print and log messages to reduce repetitions
Added method that implements a more intelligent AI decision logic based on some priorities in the choice of card to play

Added rule for which the last take does not count as an additional point (scopa); Added rule for the distribution at the end of the round of the last table cards to the last one that have a capture Small corrections to log messages and prints and comments
Optimized Scanner usage and closing to improve memory management and prevents potential resource leaks
Optimized getBestCaptureForCard() by replacing the unnecessary new ArrayList instance with the clear method on the same list
